column5: Our conveniently located 3 story town home provides easy access to downtown Houston, the Medical Center, and NRG stadium. We are located right off a major freeway (no noise though!) and just a 45 minute drive to Galveston. You will have the first floor to yourself with a bedroom and attached bathroom. The living room and kitchen are located on the middle floor. We enjoy cooking and entertaining so our kitchen is fully stocked with any utensils you could need.
column8: Modern Private Room & Bath Near Med Center & NRG
